Room.Name: Cypress Trees
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a grove of cypress trees on the south bank of the Lithium Inlet.
Room.LongDescription: The trees get denser to the south and the east, forming a dark, shadowy canopy where you hear small sounds unlike anything you have ever heard in a forest before. The walkway, however, is broad and well maintained by the groundskeepers here in the park.
